title: The Animal ark: a refuge for our world's wildlife
creator_credit: Freewheelin' Films, American Educational Films and Rodney H. Jacobs
brief_description: Tells of the struggle Gerald Durrell has to establish a non profit sanctuary for the preservation of animals on the island of Jersey. He now maintains this unique “zoo” where endangered species of animals are protected from the encroachment of man and eventual extinction.
